snippet: In addition to shutting down shipping terminals and submerging warehouses, the storm tangled up deliveries, just as retailers normally receive final shipments for the holiday shopping season.
abstract: Supply chain crippled by Hurricane Sandy is putting holiday shopping at risk; in addition to shutting down shipping terminals and submerging warehouses, storm also tangled up deliveries just as retailers normally receive final shipments for holiday season; delays are hitting smaller merchants particularly hard.

byline.original: By STEPHANIE CLIFFORD and NELSON D. SCHWARTZ

lead_paragraph: In addition to shutting down shipping terminals and submerging warehouses, the storm tangled up deliveries, just as retailers normally receive final shipments for the holiday shopping season.

headline.seo: A Storm-Battered Supply Chain Threatens Holiday Shopping
headline.main: A Storm-Battered Supply Chain Threatens Holiday Shopping
headline.print_headline: Crippled Supply Chain Puts Holiday Shopping at Risk
